__e: I want to thank you personally for what you've done. Not only for righting a wrong, but for helping us build for the future.
To fight injustice and save people is my goal in life.
And if I can fight injustice and slam my foot up her ass at the same time, then that's a win.
But you can use it to stop any injustice being done to anybody.
Go find out what injustice he did to her, and get revenge for her, too.
What a mockery of justice That I can't take even a little tiny peek.
